description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ao4u","text":"This is the protocol for Immunocytochemistry (ICC) for Progenitor markers FOXA2 and OTX2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"b2mpp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a11jj","text":" Blocking Buffer (BP) 1x PBS 5% BSA 0.3% Triton X-100 To make 10mL of Blocking Buffer: 0.5g of BSA 30µl of Triton X-100 Fill to 10mL with 1x PBS   1º antibody (-20ºC fridge) FOXA2 Rb OTX2 Mus IgG 2º antibodies (4ºC fridge) A11008 Alexa Flour 488 goat anti-rabbit IgG (HHH+L) A10036 Alexa Flour546 donkey anti-mouse IgG (H+L) Thermo Fisher Cat # A11008 Thermo Fisher Cat # A10036 DAPI (-20ºC fridge) Stock 1mg/mL Final (1µg/mL) - Each well of both 8µm Chamber slide and 48-well plate should use 200µL of solution ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":626}],"data":{}},{"key":"anc8n","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"205d6","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5inuv","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":""},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["214","214","214"],"data":[[" Blocking Buffer (BP) "," 1x PBS 5% BSA 0.3% Triton X-100 "," To make 10mL of Blocking Buffer: 0.5g of BSA 30µl of Triton X-100 Fill to 10mL with 1x PBS   "],[" 1º antibody (-20ºC fridge) "," FOXA2 Rb OTX2 Mus IgG "," "],[" 2º antibodies (4ºC fridge) "," A11008 Alexa Flour 488 goat anti-rabbit IgG (HHH+L) A10036 Alexa Flour546 donkey anti-mouse IgG (H+L) "," Thermo Fisher Cat # A11008 Thermo Fisher Cat # A10036 "],[" DAPI (-20ºC fridge) "," Stock 1mg/mL "," Final (1µg/mL) "],[" - Each well of both 8µm Chamber slide and 48-well plate should use 200µL of solution ","",""]],"guid":"0199D7D03C4A11EE94AC4322B7C26584","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{"A_5":[3,1]},"printData":[[" Blocking Buffer (BP) "," 1x PBS 5% BSA 0.3% Triton X-100 "," To make 10mL of Blocking Buffer: 0.5g of BSA 30µl of Triton X-100 Fill to 10mL with 1x PBS   "],[" 1º antibody (-20ºC fridge) "," FOXA2 Rb OTX2 Mus IgG "," "],[" 2º antibodies (4ºC fridge) "," A11008 Alexa Flour 488 goat anti-rabbit IgG (HHH+L) A10036 Alexa Flour546 donkey anti-mouse IgG (H+L) "," Thermo Fisher Cat # A11008 Thermo Fisher Cat # A10036 "],[" DAPI (-20ºC fridge) "," Stock 1mg/mL "," Final (1µg/mL) "],[" - Each well of both 8µm Chamber slide and 48-well plate should use 200µL of solution ","",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"44tqo","text":"Grow the cells on either 8µm chamber slide or 48-well plate. (1x105cells/well)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8nna","text":"-         Coating and plating densities can be found in the differentiation kit","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c9smu","text":"Fixation: Cover cells with warm 4% PFA and fix for 20 min at RT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5h84","text":"-         Cover the vessel and place in the hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fdscb","text":"Rinse 3X in 1x PBS for 5 min each at the lab bench","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7v20u","text":"Blocking and permeabilize for 30 min at RT with Blocking Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5fet3","text":"1º antibody incubation dilute in 1/3 blocking buffer + 1x PBS and incubate overnight in the cold room","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"doskh","text":"-20º (box labelled antibodies for iPSCs)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbrdu","text":"-         FOXA2 Rb à (1:250)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fa8rh","text":"-         OTX2 Mus IgG à (1:250)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7i533","text":"o   Add 4µl of antibody per 1mL of prepared antibody solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c7vm0","text":"Rinse three times in 1x PBS for 5 min each","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pqu4","text":"2º antibody incubation for 1hr at RT in the dark","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38sup","text":"-         A11008 Alexa Flour 488 goat anti-rabbit IgG (HHH+L) 1:400 in PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fqoc","text":"-         A10036 Alexa Flour546 donkey anti-mouse IgG (H+L) 1:400 in PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"52orp","text":"o   Add 2.5µL of antibody per 1mL of prepared antibody solution  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"246u0","text":"*Combine these two antibodies in one tube. Ex. If you were making 1.6mL (for 8 wells) you would add 4µL of each antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b1s4b","text":"Incubate with DAPI at (1µg/mL) for 10min at RT (Stock is 1mg/mL which is 1000x)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ar763","text":"a.      Add 1µl of Stock DAPI to 1mL of prepared solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
